question: Which Indian airline has depicted 'Ik Onkar' on tail to mark 550th birth anniversary of Sri Guru Nanak Dev?
explanation: In a unique gesture to mark 550th Prakash Purb of Sri Guru Nanak Dev ji, National carrier Air India has depicted Sikh religious symbol \'Ik Onkar\' on one of its Boeing 787 Dreamliner aircraft . The aircraft will fly on October 31 from Amritsar to London.  Ek Onkar, which means \"God is One\", is the religious symbol of the Sikh religion and is found on Gurdwaras (Sikh temples) around the world.
